section.title: Description
section.p: A collection of Intolerance Condition (aka Allergy) records. This class represents the traditional "Allergy List" that is used to inform the Provider of substances that should likely be avoided when treating the Patient.

stentry.p: Indicates whether the Patient has any records of Intolerance Condition(s). When this property is false, it is equivalent to saying that the Patient has "No Known Allergies".
Pointer to individual Intolerance Condition (aka Allergy) records that make up the Intolerance Condition List.
